attributes.action: Postpone or significantly lower grade boundaries for A-levels
attributes.background: due to the amount of stress the covid-19 already has on students I recommend anything that could make it easier for students and increase their motivation

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced the closure of secondary schools to most pupils, and has said that it will work with the sector and Ofqual to ensure children get the qualifications they need: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/schools-colleges-and-early-years-settings-to-close

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
